title: Roy Tang
description: Roy Tang's blog. Programmer, engineer, scientist, critic, gamer, dreamer, and kid-at-heart. Randomly amazed.

Him: “Pano ko nga malalaman number ko?”

Me: “Ako nilalagay ko contact number ko sa cellphone ko”

Him: “Onga, tama, ako din”
